home.name: Amr Breekaa
home.title: Software Engineer
home.introduction:
I'm a software engineer with broad interests across computer science, particularly in AI, machine learning, data, and security. I like building things and digging into low-level systems, combining practical development with ongoing research and learning to explore new technologies and solve real problems.

 This site highlights my projects and technical writing. I'm open to connecting and collaborating on meaningful work.
